QuestData.Title: The Moss-twined Heart
QuestData.Description: The heart of Blackmoss the Fetid is covered with a dark, oily moss. In fact, the only way to tell this is a heart is from its slow, rhythmic beat... A beat that continues even now.$B$BPerhaps Denalan will want to see this heart.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Moss-twined Heart to Denalan at Lake Al'Ameth.
QuestData.RewardText: ...What is this? A timberling heart?? It's covered with a foul moss!$B$BThank you for bringing this to me, $N. I will examine the heart and, if fortune shines, determine the nature of the moss about it.
